name: Ferienhof Hubertus
description:
Our guesthouse is in a sunny and quiet location in the small hamlet of Brandberg in Zillertal valley and is an ideal base for walks, mountaineering tours in the Zillertal Alps and South Tirol / Italy. Join us on walk through blossoming spring meadows or colorful fall forests. 
Our rooms are all equipped with shower, WC, satellite TV and balcony. In the mornings we serve an extended breakfast. We also offer a holiday apartment sleeping up to 4 guests. 
Amenities include a sauna bath, tanning bed, sun terrace, Tirolean-style guest lounge, and ping pong table. 
Mayrhofen is only a 10 minutes drive from our house. In winter a free shuttle brings you to the ski areas.

Check-in: till 19:00 hrs, Check-out:  9:00 hrs;
Arrival: Approx. 1 km before Mayrhofen turn left into the tunnel, then turn right to direction Brandberg. After Gasthof Thanner - the 1st house on the right side below the street.

makesOffer.name: Apartment
makesOffer.description:
Apartment "Alpenrose"
55 m² + 2 balconies 
for 2-4 persons 
2 bedrooms with separate bathrooms ( shower, WC, towel dryer) and flatscreen TV 
comfortable kitchen with eating area and 40-inch flatscreen TV 
kitchen features: 
ceramic hob with 4 plates 
oven 
dishwasher 
fridge with freezer compartment 
sufficient dishes, including soup plates, egg cups, as well as a coffee set 
a wide range of kitchen tools, including a cooking spoon, various knives, as well as a colander 
coffeemaker (filters provided) 
microwave 
toaster 
egg cooker and electric kettle
washing liquid, cleaning rags, dishtowels, dishwasher tab, brush and dustpan, scrubber 
safe 
towel dryer in winter / drying rack in summer 
rubbish separation system and bin bags
